title: The Book Of Christmas: The Customs, Ceremonies, Traditions, Superstitions And Fun Of The Season
description: Very informative book on the history of Christmas. The authors describes in detail about how modern day traditions came to fruition. This book is for the reader who wants to know in depth about how Christmas came to be and how customs from hundreds of years still survive today.Some of the topics that the book talks about:1. Celebration of Jesus2. Origination of 12 Days of Christmas3. Father Christmas, the guy before Santa Clause4. Presents were not always given on Christmas Day5. Various Christmas games that were played in the past6. The history of the mistletoe kiss
author: Thomas Kibble Hervey
